_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

destinationID.title: Destination ID
destinationID.description: Unique Identifier for a destination instance

adobeNamespace.title: Adobe Namespace
adobeNamespace.description: This is a human readable identifier for the namespace and can be used to request the technical namespace id which is used for identity graph processing.

partnerNamespace.title: Partner Namespace
partnerNamespace.description: This is a human readable identifier for the partner namespace.

createTime.title: Create Time
createTime.description: The date and UTC time when the activation flow to the destination-namespace mapping was createdByID

createdByID.title: Created User ID
createdByID.description: ID of user who created the destination flow
